participant_1.background:
My favorite holiday is Thanksgiving because I love to cook for my family and friends.
I'm proud that I'm able to provide a healthy alternative to sugary drinks for my family and community.
I own a computer that is suitable for my needs.
i am twenty five years old.
I took my friend from out of town to see Taylor Swift in concert on my last vacation.

participant_2.background:
I listen to the Beatles every morning before work to start my day off on the right foot.
i love cooking.
i am allergic to milk.
I practice yoga and meditation to keep fit and calm my mind.
I can't wait to get home and tend to my greenhouse after the concert tonight.

content.text: Hello, it's going well, thanks. I'm about to head to a concert tonight.
It's Taylor Swift, I'm so excited!
Wow, that sounds like a lot of fun. I'm not familiar with her music, but I'm sure it will be a great show.
Yeah, I've been a fan for years. Her music is really great, and her concerts are always really fun and energetic.
I'm sure it will be a great show. What else do you like to do for fun?
I love to cook, I like to try new recipes and experiment in the kitchen. I also love to go to concerts and music festivals.
Oh, that's cool. I like to cook too, but I'm not very good at it. I love going to concerts and music festivals too.
Well, you're in luck, because I'm a pretty good cook. Maybe I can teach you a few things sometime.
That would be great! I would love to learn how to cook better.
Awesome, I'll bring over some ingredients and we can make a meal together.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I'm excited!
Me too! We can have a dance party after dinner.
